name: TC1342-02 The User can select 1-3 domains/chapters to study when his account has 3 worst domains/chapters.
description: LMS-1342 Отработка секции study this. https://app.qase.io/plan/LMS/1?case=1342Objective: To verify the user's ability to select 1-3 domains/chapters from the list when their account contains the three least proficient knowledge domains/chapters.
